meanings.definition: The act of providing a company or organization with employees.
meanings.sent1: The staffing of the new store was a priority for the manager.
meanings.sent2: The staffing levels at the office were sufficient to handle the workload.
meanings.sent3: The staffing of the costume party with superheroes made for a fun event.
meanings.sent4: The staffing of the ship with a skilled crew ensured a smooth voyage.
meanings.sent5: The staffing of the hospital during flu season was crucial for patient care.

meanings.definition: The group of employees working for a company or organization.
meanings.sent1: The staffing in the marketing department was very efficient.
meanings.sent2: The staffing of the restaurant included chefs, servers, and hosts.
meanings.sent3: The staffing in the office was like a big family, always helping each other out.
meanings.sent4: The staffing of the football team with talented players led to victory.
meanings.sent5: The staffing of the construction site with experienced workers ensured quality work.
